page.title: 16OUR VILLAGE POSTMAN (cont.)
page.content: of parcels up to 50lbs it is not unusual to see{Mr.Moss}pushing his bike with a flymo,or a small barrow on the front carrier.At about 11.40 am his work is finished,and he cycles home having done his regular 15 miles. In the winter it is a very cold job and he often has to push his bike when the roads and lanes are slippery,and on rainy days he gets soaked to the skin.Mr.Moss is very busy at Christmas time and after Christmas he delivers many booklets and holiday brochures. It's an interesting life for our village postman and he meets and knows every person in the village.He loves his job very much and never wants to part from it.
